credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Frank J. Mather, Jr.
title: Sketchbook
medium: pencil on paper, bound in leather and cloth
inscriptions: inside front cover c. in pencil: A book of sketches by J.E. Millais,/ probably early work indicating the/ care with which the artist/ studied anatomy + form.  The/ studies on pps 9, 36, 43 appear/ in published work.
